text: Universal City, California is a unincorporated community within the San Fernando Valley region of Los Angeles, California. ==Other websites== * Oak Crest -Universal Ranch 1913 * Universal City 1912 * " Facts and Figures about Universal City" "Souvenir Edition" Â©1915 * Nestor Plant Article * Universal City 1914 Category:1910s establishments in California Category:1915 establishments in the United States Category:Unincorporated communities in California Category:Settlements in Los Angeles County, California
